trivia_items.text: She is named after the alternative name for common seadragon (Phyllopteryx taeniolatus), weedy seadragon. A robot with the shape of her namesake is present on Weedy's sprite and the silhouette of a common seadragon can be seen in her Elite 2 artwork. Her Chinese name, however, refers to the common English name "Wendy."

Along with Cliffheart, Shaw, Rope and FEater, Weedy has become the subject of a meme within the Arknights community known as "Crownslayer Bully" where the five Operators exploit their push/pull skills to mess up Crownslayer's pathing, especially in 4-4.
